description:
The deal was to get 5 new members for the Karuta club.  Chihaya has to figure out a way to keep the room and deal with the band club.  
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shiru mo Shiranu mo Ousaka no Seki
They All Exchange Hellos and Goodbyes at the Famous Gates of Afusaka
しるもしらぬも あふさかのせき
